title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 502.1 - General requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 502.1 - General requirements

State Regulations

To be eligible to receive medical assistance payments for
services, providers and fiscal agents (known as disclosing entities) are
required with respect to their organizations or institutions to: (a) disclose certain direct or indirect
ownership and control information; and
(b) disclose information about any owner, agent or managing employee convicted of criminal offenses against programs
operated pursuant to title XVIII (Medicare), title XIX (Medicaid) and title XX
(Social Services) of the Federal Social Security Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
502.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
